answers.answer: I'm 27 weeks and my feet got swollen once because I wore high heels one day all day long. Try to reduce the salt intake that should help but if that keeps happening ask your doctor if it's normal.
I would call your doctor. Swelling of the feet is probably normal but i know your hands and face could be a sign of preeclampsia so it's better to be safe and call. It could be totally normal though!

question: Ftm I'm 22 weeks 5 days and I'm swelling in my feet and hands possibly my face as well. I know swelling is normal during pregnancy, but I'm early.
title: to early to swell?-help ftm
